abstract.p: Kathleen D Love is named to vacant post of president and chief operating officer at Mediamark Research Inc; Gail Ettinger is named to new post of executive vice president and general manager at Internet division of KSL Media (Advertising column) (S)

block.p: * Kathleen D. Love was named to the vacant post of president and chief operating officer at Mediamark Research Inc., New York, part of United News and Media. She had been vice president for research and advertising planning at the EMAP Petersen Cos., New York. * Gail Ettinger, executive vice president and director for national broadcast at KSL Media, New York, part of True North Communications, was named to the new post of executive vice president and general manager at the Internet division, Drive to Site Media.

* Kathleen D. Love was named to the vacant post of president and chief operating officer at Mediamark Research Inc., New York, part of United News and Media. She had been vice president for research and advertising planning at the EMAP Petersen Cos., New York. * Gail Ettinger, executive vice president and director for national broadcast at KSL Media, New York, part of True North Communications, was named to the new post of executive vice president and general manager at the Internet division, Drive to Site Media.
